question.text: The recommended concentration of fluoride ion in drinking water is up to 1 ppm as fluoride ion is required to make teeth enamel harder by converting <math><mo>[</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>]</mo></math> to

options.text: <math><mo>[</mo><mn>3</mn><mfenced close="]" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></math>

<math><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></math>

solution.text: <math><mo>[</mo><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><mo>(</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><mfenced close="]" separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi><msub><mrow><mo>)</mo></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup><mo>→</mo><mfenced close="]" open="[" separators="|"><mrow><mn>3</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>3</mn></mrow></msub><msub><mrow><mfenced separators="|"><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">P</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>4</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub><mo>.</mo><mi mathvariant="normal">C</mi><mi mathvariant="normal">a</mi><msub><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">F</mi></mrow><mrow><mn>2</mn></mrow></msub></mrow></mfenced><mo>+</mo><mn>2</mn><mi mathvariant="normal">O</mi><msup><mrow><mi mathvariant="normal">H</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>-</mo></mrow></msup></math>
